div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo die nouembris anno quo supra

The said' day cristj prat Oblist him tile Entir Sandy pardonere befor
the aldirman and balyeis within the tolbutht betuix this and Sanct nicho
les day nixt hereftir or one our lady evin next thareftir at the ferrast
tile ansuir' at the Instance of the minister of the trinite place et cetera

The said' day the aldirmane and Counsale present for the tyme conducit and
feit sere Dauid Runseman Sangstar to Remane within thame and mak
thame continuale gude seruice in Sengin in thar queir' and kirk for
ane yer' next hereftir for siclik fee as he hs' this yer' bigane
that is his mett and drink in dietis ymang the gud' mene In the
tone and fourtj Schillingis to be pait to him be the denys of
the gild'

The said' day Jonhne ramsay was quyt be ane Suorne
assis' patry leslie forspekar of the clame of malcome of Crag
anent the wrang of ane pip of quyt wyne and It was fundin
that the said' Johne hed' done to his bile of waring it that he aw to do

The said' day patry arthour lauchfullie warnit Callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be cristy prat for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of Sex franche crovnis et cetera and of xxtj s' of Siluer tharfor
the balyeis chargit William scrimgeor seriand' to pas and tak ane distres' of the
said' patry and lat it agan to borghe' and it be askit and warne him to comper
this day xv dais to ansuer' to the said' borghe' as thrid' day of proces'

Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure Andree Cullane Anno Domini
Millesimo quingentesimo Sexto

Johannes burneile Anglicus ac plumbarius Regis anglie gracia prepositi
et Consilij recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento
Dauid Andirsone receptus in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde gracia
prepositj et Consilij prestito Solito Juramento
quarto die octobris anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo Septimo

Johannes menyeis Jure paternitatis receptus fuit in liberum burgensen et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento ac Soluet quinque s' in alba bursa
Johannes abirdour receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis
prestito solito Juramento ac Soluet v s' in alba bursa
Alexander forbes receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis prestito
Solito Juramento ac Soluet v s' in alba bursa
Duncanus mar' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis
prestito Solito Juramento ac Soluet v s' in alba bursa
Johannes crag receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde In paternitatis prestito
Solito Juramento ac Soluet v s' in alba bursa
Andreas fyf receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis
prestito Solito Juramento ac soluet v s' in alba bursa
Adam fyf receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis prestito
Solito Juramento et soluet v s' in alba bursa
Robertus Waus receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis
prestito Solito Juramento Ac Soluet v s' in alba bursa
Robertus Steuart receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure pater
nitatis prestito Solito Juramento ac Soluet v s' in alba bursa
Skynnere receptus fuit in liberum burgensem quia sponsauit filiam quondam
Richardi cullane burgensis prestito Solito Juramento ac soluet v s' in alba bursa

head.add: The prising of gudis pertening to Johne mydilton'

div.p:
The tende day of the monetht of October the yer' of gode jM vc and vjj yeris
Androw nacthy ane of the officiaris of Abirdene at commavnde of the balyeis
presentit the gudis eftir writin takin and distresit for xxxij s' of maile aving
to Johne of murray to the mercat and offerit tham to sale to ony persone that
wald' by tham for the pament of the said' Some In the first ane gret
pres' Ande almary and Weschele burd' tua trestis ane alde Schryne and
ane ald' kyst as first day of proces' befor thir witnes William rolland'
and Androw Johnsone

The xvij day of the said' monetht of Octobir the said officiar' presentit the said'
gudis to the mercat offering tham to Sele as secund' day of proces' befor
thir witnes Androw grig and Androw gordone

The xxiiij day of the saide monetht the said' officiar' presentit the saide gudis to the
mercat offering tham to Sele et cetera as thrid day of proces' befor patry rede and Johne
herone

The secunde day of nouember' the yer' forsaide the saide officiar' presentit the said'
gudis to the mercat as ferd' day of proces' and becaus' he coud nocht comprehend'
nay person to by thame he causit William rollande henry andirsone Androw Johnesone
alan talyour and Alexander Rollande the gret aitht suorne pris' the said' gudis In the
first the pres' and almary to xxtj s' the weschele bynk ij s' j burd' ij trestis and ane
langsadile for xxxtj d' Ande j schryne and ane alde kyst for viij s' Some
xxxij s' and vj d' quhilkis gudis the saide officiar' perofferit tile ony persone that wald'
pay the saide Some Ande becaus' he coude nocht coomprehende the said' Johne
nor nayn vthir that wald' by thame and pay the saide Some he deliuerit thame
to the saide Johne of murray for pament of the said' Some at commavnd
of the balyeis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxj die
Nouembris Anno quo supra

The xxj day of nouember' forsaid' It was statut and ordanit be the
aldirman balyeis that ale the baxtaris of this burghe' havande redy stuf
sale haue redy bakyne breid' of quhet this nycht to serue the tone keping
the pace gevin to thame Obefor And' quhay falyeis heruntile salbe secludit
fra the Craft for ane yer' And' gif ony of thame bakis within ane yer'
thareftir sale pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin and viij s'
to the balyeis for thar' vnlaw

The said' day thomas buchan Androw gordone Donalde baxtar Canny buchan
Androw Dwne thome straloche Richerde redhed' baxtaris was conuict' be
ane Suorne assis' for brekin of commone ordinance throue wanting
of bred' of quhet to furnis' and serue the tone and for breking of the
pace for the quhilkis Ilkan of thame was in ane Amerciament of the Court
et cetera

The said' day Syme flessour thome lammyntone and Johne flessour was conuict
be ane Suorne assis' for brekin of commone ordinance in Selling
of flesche or it was prisit for the quhilkis Ilkane of thame was
in ane Amerciament of the Court et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die mensis nouembris
anno quo supra

The said' day thome straloche and gilbert tulidef be thar avne toung graunt
was conuict' for brekin of the pas' of breid' agan the commone statutis and Actis
Androw gordone thomas buchan Donald' baxtar Richerd redhed' Canny buchan
baxtaris was conuict be ane Suorne assis' patry red' forspekar for bre
kin of the pas' agan the commone statutis and Actis of the toune for the
quhilkis Ilkan of thame was in ane Amerciament of the Court et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvijo
die mensis nouembris anno quo supra

head.add: grantit to pay xiij s' iiij d' to Alexander Wischeart

div.p:
The said' day the Counsale ordanit to pay xiij s' and iiij d' to Alexander Wische
art for his hous' maile quhile witsonday that next cumis of Sanct
nicholes gudis

The said day Dauid theman gaf our' the kepin' of the commone knok
to giddir with the half nethis of the furdis quhilkis he hed' in tak
beseking the aldirman balyeis and Counsale to mak him be pait of
his fee bigane promittit to him for the kepin of the said' knok

add.foreign: Reuocacio Statuti pro equitanti in festo Sancti Nicholaij

div.p:
The said' day the aldirman balyeis counsale and diuers' of the communite
present for the tyme

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo die
mensis Decembris anno quo supra

The saide day the prouest and balyeis chargit and ordanit Johne pelour' in
the Skulhile Cristy in the nethirkirkgate and Androw Walcar' in the gallougat
to decist and ces' fra the occupeing of fremennis labour' vnto the tume
thai be maid' fremen' et cetera

Eodem die Katherina cullane filia quondam mathei cullan et vna heredum quondam thome cullane patrij
sui in sua pura viduitate fecit Constituit creauit et nominauit Johannem mar'
burgensis dicti burgi heredes suos conuinctim et diuisim suos procuratores Irreuocabiles assignatos
et cessonarios dans et concedens eisdem ac eorum cuilibet suam potestatem et
mandatum speciale et generale breuia Inquisicionis capelle regie de et super dimidietate
vnius crofti Jacente in territorio australi croftorum de abirdene ex australi parte
vici quo Itur ad molendinum Justiciarij inter croftum quondam thome prat ex orientali
ex vna et communiones vias regias ex occidentali et boreali partibus et torrentem versus
austrum et cetera eadem preposito et balliuis presentandi deseruirj faciendum Retournatum eidem capelle
remittendum litteram sasine adipiscendum leuandum Sasinam heredam Inde petendum exigendum
et recipiendum et cetera Promittens de Rato et grato pro certa summa pecunie et cetera sub
penis et Infamie Et si contingerit quod obsit de uno omnia premissa
approvat et Ratificat et cetera Insuper Sigillum et Sigillum thome Wod'
ballivi Justicio inde conficiendum appendendum Instantum procurauit Sibi quibus dictus
Johanne mar' a me Johanne Stirueling notario publico peciit Instrumentum Actum in pretorio
hora quasi xj ante merediem presentibus Andrea Cullane preposito thoma Wod' Johanne Cullan
Alexandro mar' thoma leslie Juniore Willelmo scrimgeor Normanno leslie et Andrea nachtj
sergeandis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quarto die
mensis Decembris Anno quo supra

The said' day patry arthour' lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit
tile ansuer' to the borghe fundin one him be cristj prat for the wranguis'
withhaldin fra him of Sex franche crovnis and xxtj s' of Siluer tharfor the
balyeis chargit Williame scrimgeor seriand' to pas' and tak ane stres' of the
saide patry and lat it agane to borghe' and It be askit and warne him
to Comper this day xv dais and It be lauchfule and falyeing tharof the next
lauchfule day thareftir tile ansuer to the said' burghe' as ferd' day of proces'

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to Androw gordoun'
merchand man and marioun' andersoune to ansuer to the borgh' fundin
one thame be Johnne andirsone for

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta' in pretorio eiusdem xjo
die mensis Decembris Anno quo supra

The said' day Alexander sclatar grauntit him aving to Androw Cullane
aldirman sex bollis of malt quhilkis the balyeis chargit him
to pay within terme of law

The saide day Johne brakoche was in ane amerciament of the Court by his avne
toung graunt for forstalling of the burghe in bying of hidis

Alsua the saide Johne was in Amerciament of the Court in bying
of Skinnis forstalling the burghe et cetera And' to amend' as law
wile and forbeir' in tyme to Cum

The said day besse Dingwaill grantit that scho hed ane
lavne curch' of Katherin chameris contenyng iij eln' quhilk
the balyes chargit hir to pay within terme of lawe et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv xiiijto die
mensis Decembris Anno quo supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit the law day eftir yule the hed'
Court to be haldin the xj day of Januar' next to Cum to cristy prat
tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Robert Waus Curatour'
to Robert Prat for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ane doubile
Comptour and ane gret pot wortht v li' pertening to him of airschipe

The saide day the balyeis assignit the law day eftir yule next hereftir
to Cristj prat tile ansuer' to the borghe fundin one him be Robert
Waus Curatour to Robert prat for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him et cetera
of iiij yeris annuellis of the gastrawe Ilke yer' xij s' et viii d' and fiwe
termes annuellis of sere Androw Colisone Ilkan terme viij s' and iiij d' and iiijor
Inglis grotis of the bowrig et cetera iiij yeris and demi barrele Salmonde fra
patry chernsid' for the maile of ane Croft price xv s' the hale vj li' ij s'
and viij d' quhilkis the said' cristy has takin vp pertening to the said' Robert
Prat

head.add: The tennentis of the lande of the myllar'

div.p:
The said' day the aldirman and balyeis ordanit and chargit the tennentis of
hessilhed' Schethoisley and bogferlowe to pay to the myllar' of the
Justice myllis xvj d' of Ilkan pleuche within terme of law for ane yeris seruice
anent thar deuteis to the said' myllis in ale thingis Except' thar' multur

Eodem die Andreas lousone fecit constituit creauit et nominauit magistros
Johannem badenaghe' vicariam de gemry et Dauid lousone coniunctim et diuisim suos
veros legitimos et Indubitatos procuratores ad prosequendum terram Interiorem dominj Johannis
malisone Jacente in vico Castrj et cetera et in omnibus aliis causis querelis et debatis
ipsum tangens dans et concedens eisdem ac eorum alteri suam presentatem Integram
et mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo agendum proseuqendum defendendum et cetera respondendum
obitiendum promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviij die
mensis Decembris anno quo supra

head.add: Statut' for baxtaris broustaris et cetera

div.p:
The said' day It was statut and ordanit be the Counsale that the aldirman
sale pas' Ilkan ouk throu the toune with certan personis and officiaris
with him and ger' wey ale the bred' of quhet of the baxtaris and
ale that kepis nocht the pas to distribut it to goddis folkis in almys and
In likuis' ale broustaris that brekis commone ordinance and statutis of the
toune and Sellis thar aile derrar thane It beis Set to distribut it in
almys and ale flesche that beis sauld' or it be prisit to distribut
It In the said' wys'

The said' day Norman leslie William scrimgeor Androw nachtj and Jonhne Cuk
seriandis was conuict' be the aldirman and counsale becaus' thai do
nocht to thar office It that accordis tham to do

The saide day Spungeous' calsay dichtar' oblist him be the fatht of his
bodie to clenge and dicht the commone kingis gatis of this burghe' deulie
as efferis be the sicht of the aldirman balyeis and counsale for this Instant
yer' for the quhilkis euere Induellar' in Ilke fyer' hous' sale pay to him ij d' in the
yer'
